随机分析阐明了卵巢老化和更年期的时机在卵巢衰老和卵巢储备的耗尽的驱动下，更年期标志着女性的生育能力的终结，尽管这些过程的许多方面都得到了充分了解，但总体动态尚不清楚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/stochastic-analysis-sheds-neds-light-on-ovarian-aging-anging-anging-anging-ang-menopause-timing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/stochastic-analysis-sheds-light-on--on-avarian-aging-anging-anging-anging-ang-menopause-timing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ed2693a-5215-4049-a172-172-155852691382 Tue, 25 Feb 2025 21:50:53 -0500 Stochastic analysis sheds light on ovarian aging and menopause timing
瘦和油性鱼类的消耗与MS的残疾进展缓慢有关多发性硬化症患者（MS）的瘦和油性鱼类饮食摄入量可能会减缓残疾的进展，这表明一项基于比较的研究，在线发表在《神经病学杂志》上的神经神经外科和精神病学杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/lean-and-yaly-fish-consumption-linked-linked-to-slower-disability-disability-disability-in-ms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/lean-and-yaly-fish-consumption-linked-to-slower-disbower-disability-disability-progression-in-ms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3dd71bb-0f43-4505-938f-a03586Adf620 Tue, 25 Feb 2025 21:46:00 -0500 Lean and oily fish consumption linked to slower disability progression in MS

空气铅浓度发现会影响婴儿死亡率在发达国家和发展中国家中，空气中的铅浓度仍然很大，主要是工业排放的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/air-lead-concentrations-found-to-to-to-to-to-confect-infant-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/air-lead-concentrations-found-to-to-to-to-to-confect-infant-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=14440766B-E6CA-43C6-A8FF-6E7DD44582E1 Tue, 25 Feb 2025 21:26:55 -0500 Air lead concentrations found to affect infant mortality
新工具可以通过快速癌细胞检测来彻底改变脑肿瘤手术新研究显示，一种用于快速识别癌细胞遗传“指纹”的新工具可能使未来的外科医生在患者在手术室时更准确地清除脑肿瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/new-tool-could-revolutionsize-brain-brain-tumor-surgery-with-rapid-cancer-cancer-cell-cell-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/new-tool-could-revolutionsize-brain-brain-tumor-surgery-with-rapid-cancer-cancer-cell-cell-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e0ff82ae-ef0b-4073-9006-5353847DADB0 Tue, 25 Feb 2025 21:22:00 -0500 New tool could revolutionize brain tumor surgery with rapid cancer cell detection
